title.rendered: Hitting High Long Drives Is Easy When You Do This

content.rendered:
The Launch Deck is available at a great price for the next 4 days 14 hrs 46 mins and 40 secs… due to limited supply. Hurry and grab yours now!
The special offer for the Launch Deck has expired

Hitting High, Long Drives Is Easy When You Do This

Great news! After seeing Hank Haney showing off The Launch Deck, I went out and got one for myself. After putting this thing through rigorous testing, I’ve decided I love it! See more details below, but first, here’s more info on The Launch Deck…

Your Next Step: Get The Launch Deck!

Get The Launch Deck and eliminate your slice–and naturally swing from the inside–without having to spend hours practicing!

The Launch Deck is the world’s first training aid that fixes your swing path AND your angle of attack–at the same time.

You simply set the orange Swing Gates to correct an over-the-top or a too-far-inside path… and then just “swing through the gates!”

If you can swing without hitting the rubber pylons, you’re getting the club moving in the right direction.

Then, if you can clear the Launch Hurdle in front of your tee, that means you’re either swinging level or up on the ball.

The tee placements have been strategically calibrated to give you the “optimal angle of attack.”

The instant feedback, portability, and simplicity of the Launch Deck are making it one of the most talked about training aids on the market today.

Make sure you click the big button below to visit our partner’s site and hear more about The Launch Deck from Hank Haney himself!

Our partners over at Performance Golf have agreed to give you the opportunity to purchase The Launch Deck at a great price for a short period of time. Due to limited supply, this offer is only available through Wednesdayat 10pm Eastern.

Click the big button below to visit our partner’s site to find out more and purchase it. Just to be upfront… I’ll earn a small percentage on any purchases you make. That’ll help us keep making more great content for you!

Visit Performance Golf’s website to learn more about the Launch Deck from Hank Haney himself! ->
